pages.title: Blue mushroom
pages.text: Inedible.Small blue mushroom.Grows in tropical biomes.

pages.title: Brain Mushroom
pages.text: Edible.Strange mushroom,similar to a brain.Grows in Swamplands, Wicked Lands, Temperate Fir Forest.

pages.title: Giant Puffball
pages.text: Edible.Giant round mushroom.Grows in temperate sparse biomes.

pages.title: Green Amanita
pages.text: ...or a Death Cap.Inedible and deadly poisonous!Grows in Wicked Lands and Temperate Fir Forest.

pages.title: Chanterelle
pages.text: Edible.Tasty mushroom, grows in temperate forests.

pages.title: Indigo Milkcup
pages.text: Edible.Flat blue  mushroom.Grows in temperate and warm forests.

pages.title: Yakoh-Take
pages.text: Inedible.Glowing in the darkness mushrooms.Grow in Lush(asian)biomes.

pages.title: Amethyst Deceiver
pages.text: Edible.Purple small mushrooms.Grow in temperate coniferous forests.

pages.title: Big mushrooms
pages.text: Big mushrooms grow in magical biomes.Decorative only.
